Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, we are confident it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $11500. This offer is exclusive and tailored to recognize your appreciation for the product's true worth. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
